DialogOption.texten: Hello, I'm a little bit dizzy.
How long have you been dizzy?
Hmm... Maybe an hour, I can't really remember. I certainly wasn't dizzy this morning.
Do you have any other symptoms?
Well, I feel warmer than usual. Is that a bad sign?
No, I checked just 5 minutes ago.
{SEND AMBULANCE} Alright, I'm going to a send a paramedic to check up on you. Take care now, bye.
{GO TO A DOCTOR} It doesn't sound like an emergency, can you get to your doctor today? They'll be able to do a check up.
Oh dear love, well that is a problem. I've got this broken leg and I can't leave the house.
{SEND AMBULANCE} Hmm, okay then I'll send an ambulance just to be sure.
{DON'T SEND AMBULANCE} Well ma'am, I hope you get better soon. You should visit your doctor when you're able to. Stay safe now, bye.
Hello? Stupid phone it's hung up again!

reportElement.texten: An elderly woman called and reported being dizzy.
The operator sent an ambulance to the scene although it was not necessary.
The caller had a broken leg so was unable to get to the doctors yet an ambulance was not dispatched.
The caller had a broken leg so was unable to get to the doctors. An ambulance was dispatched as appropriate.
